ISSUE.TITLE: Rebasing a branch doesn't trigger a branch rebuild
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Steps to reproduce: - branch master to feature-XXX - commits changes to feature-XXX - push <-- _this will trigger a branch build as expected_ - create a PR - make more changes to feature-XXX branch, commit and push _this trigger a branch and PR build as expected, so deploy section runs fine for branch build_ - Now add changes to master and rebase feature-XXX on top of it - push <-- **UI shows a branch and PR build but both links to PR, and none to the branch**, so deploy section didn't run.
